attributes.action: improve benifits for sixteen to eighteen year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How are young people(who if they are unemployed and recieving training with connexions)be expected to survive on the paltry sum of £30 per week. Their parents can claim child benifit for them(that is if they are still living with them and many are not)But this pathetic sum will not even pay for their basic needs such as food, clothes, laundry, heating, lighting, washing etc. With 2 million unemployed now there are little job prospects for most of them anyway.
